action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Morning Heath, Looking good thanks. Just a couple of final tweaks please:
  • The link from 'User and Cost Centre Allocation' on the 'Platform' page is linking to the wrong page - it is linking to 'Flexible Cost Allocation' by mistake. Please make it link to 'User and Cost Centre Allocation' - thanks.
  • Reduce a bit the space under 'Configurable Batch Reports' page - ie between that title and the image/text section below. This will bring the spacing into line with what we requested on the other pages.
On another point, could you please somehow help to make the video on the homepage more obvious? Eg add the words 'Click for video' on the screen image just below the play button? This is because we have had a few feedbacks of people not finding the video on the homepage!?? Thanks Best Justin Justin Deeley Marketing Manager M:+61 423 328 638 E:justin.deeley@bluewatercontrol.com A: Level 5, 56 Clarence Street, Sydney, NSW 2000 Australia. W: bluewatercontrol.com
Logged 20 mins to Harvest

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Good morning Rica & Heath,

Thanks for these updates. The lifecycle Management one is perfect in terms of the image quality when clicked upon/enlarged and in terms of the reduction in space between the main title and the content below. This is a good reference of the standard we want for all the others please.

However some of the others still need some work please. For some the image when enlarged is poor / not sufficiently zoomed in….some of them it maybe the quality of the original image (if that is the case pls let me know and I will source a higher res one) and others the initial zoom when the image is clicked on is not working like the Lifecycle Mgt one.…

In terms of the spacing under the title, this does not appear to be reduced sufficiently in a number of cases - again the reference model should be the Lifecycle Mgt one.

I have listed in green below my assessment of each - please could you look into and correct?

Thanks

Justin

Justin Deeley

Marketing Manager

M:+61 423 328 638

E:justin.deeley@bluewatercontrol.com

A: Level 5, 56 Clarence Street, Sydney, NSW 2000 Australia.

W: bluewatercontrol.com
